Hence, Meng Yong decides to impart his life-long experience and skills to him. "Xi Ji" receives a large order, however, as Meng Yong and Qing Shan are injured, it will be difficult to deliver the order on time.

programme.title: Blessings S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Da Xi is saved by a lady, Chun Xian. Chun Xian reveals she is an unwilling party to an arranged marriage, Da Xi encourages her to stand up for herself and pursue her own happiness. Chun Xian decides to heed Da Xi's words and run away. Unexpectedly, Da Xi realises the groom is his great grandfather, Lian Xue Geng. Assuming Chun Xian to be his great grandmother, Da Xi regrets ruining their fated marriage and decides to change things.

programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: L'agence Galactique - EP 28
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever they're needed sorting out inhabitants' problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 27
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 58
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 47
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 48
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara - EP 29
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 3
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 6
programme.desc: Ahon and his wife Amah have become very wealthy by working the land. Koffi, a friend, visits them one day to ask for money. Ahon agrees to lend him some, but his friend tries to trap him.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 23
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 15
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's - EP 15

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Le Grand Cactus
programme.desc: Humour with spikes on! Phony reports, high-jacked programmes, pretend live broadcasts, mock celebrity interviews, fake adverts, street interviews... With their team of presenters, Adrien Devyver and Jerome de Warzee bring their own unique twist to news from Belgium and around the world, so prepare for a result that's distinctly... lively!

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 35
programme.desc: Jerome Pitorin heads to northern Madagascar for a spellbinding journey that's certain to surprise. The red island, land of a thousand different nuances, is a colourful mosaic of culture and natural beauty that it has become vital to protect. We also discover its more remote regions, far from the coast.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Dans Un Territoire Pres De Chez Vous - EP 6
programme.desc: Accompanied by the guide Benoit Croteau and his daughter elie, Brad tries his hand at canoe camping near Pikogan in Anicinape Aki. Between fishing for sturgeon and running the rapids, the Harricana River offers the perfect opportunity to pass on traditional knowledge.

programme.title: Partir Autrement Entre Amis - EP 7
programme.desc: Simon Boulerice and Noemie Yelle explore the Amari Valley in Crete. On the programme for their visit: outdoor activities and Cretan gastronomy.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Tendance Xxi - EP 28
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Terrible Jungle
programme.desc: Eliott, a naive young researcher, heads off to study a mysterious tribe in Amazonia: the Otopis. An opportunity for him to escape his stiflingly possessive mother, Chantal de Bellabre! But worried about her son, she decides to go in search of him, deep in the jungle...

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Celine are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Celine meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: #Investigation
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 6
programme.desc: The Hotel de la Marine, Paris, covers two hundred and fifty years of naval history. Multi-talented artist, Aurelie Galois paints industrial canvases in rubber, just like little secret boxes. Designer Peter Do: for the love of material and the perfect cut. Agnes Kappler makes tarot cards the old-fashioned way.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les Travaux Et Les Jours
programme.desc: Young and connected, the Cistercian nuns of the Sainte-Marie de Boulaur Abbey, in the Occitanie region, live through their faith and from their agricultural production. In order to remain independent, they have launched the building of a modern, environmentally-friendly barn, a construction project they will be supervising themselves.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 19
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 2
programme.desc: An immersive trip aboard the Breton trawler ''Le Magellan''. Ten days to the rhythm of a net that needs to be raised every 4 hours, followed by sorting, gutting and storing the fish in the hold. Ten days alongside this chain gang of the seas and their worries.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 5
programme.desc: Efforts to protect our forests are being made on several different fronts. Creating protected spaces is a particularly reliable way to protect them.

programme.title: Le Proces D'emma Bovary
programme.desc: Judged scandalous until her final breath, Emma Bovary, Flaubert's heroine, earned him a trial in a Paris magistrates' court, in 1857, for ''outrage to public morality''. Her character was studied in every detail, but the writer's intentions remain secret, served by a completely new literary style.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 5
programme.desc: Chef Leila Albert prepares a mango tart with concentrated ''kettle'' syrup.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 5
programme.desc: Efforts to protect our forests are being made on several different fronts. Creating protected spaces is a particularly reliable way to protect them.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 2
programme.desc: An immersive trip aboard the Breton trawler ''Le Magellan''. Ten days to the rhythm of a net that needs to be raised every 4 hours, followed by sorting, gutting and storing the fish in the hold. Ten days alongside this chain gang of the seas and their worries.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 38
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 39
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 21
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 36
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 35
programme.desc: Upon his return, Leo announces that he's been ''immunised'' against mutation! To celebrate, Marcus organises a treasure hunt. Meanwhile, Dahlia and Bertrand try to find Julianne, who has given herself up to Agrotek...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 5
programme.desc: Chef Leila Albert prepares a mango tart with concentrated ''kettle'' syrup.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Objectif Monde - EP 4
programme.desc: 'Objectif Monde'' proposes special reports and investigations into societal or geopolitical issues, taking the time to analyse the situations thanks to different specialist opinions. This TV5MONDE programme is produced with French-speaking partners (RTBF, RTS, Radio-Canada, France Televisions) and the support of the public French-speaking media.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)

programme.title: D'ou Viens-Tu Johnny ?
programme.desc: Without knowing it, Johnny, a young rock musician, finds himself involved with a drugs gang. Realising he was being manipulated, he threw the drugs into the Seine and took refuge in the Camargue with his family and his fiancee, Gigi. Meanwhile, the dealers are hot on their heels..

The skippers set off from Les Sables-d'Olonne in Vendée and sail around 45,000 kilometres around the globe, rounding the three legendary capes (Good Hope, Leeuwin and finally Cape Horn) before returning to Les Sables d'Olonne. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: WCCB Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
programme.desc: Five time World Champion and boxing superstar Gervonta 'Tank' Davis and undefeated World Champion Hector Luis Garcia kick off the year by headlining a stacked card from the Capital One Arena in Washington DC. Davis has established himself as one boxing's must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges' scorecards.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 15
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 23
programme.desc: The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 24
programme.desc: The Squirrels hear a strange sound that they've not heard before, so they ask Duggee to help identify it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 25
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 26
programme.desc: Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 28
programme.desc: After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 29
programme.desc: As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 30
programme.desc: Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 33
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 34
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 36
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 38
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 39
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 40
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.desc: It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.desc: Happy finds a cake lying around in the field and decides to eat it. But whose cake is it?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Duggee is having a bad hair day. Can the squirrels help him at all?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 4

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Enid the cat is stuck up the tree. How will Duggee and the squirrels get her down?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: The squirrels read a super-hero comic and decide they want to be super squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Duggee is making jam, but then his fruit is stolen.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a treasure map inside Duggee's big shiny ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: The birds keep eating Duggee's grain, so the squirrels build a scarecrow.

programme.desc: Duggee got a bouncy castle for Tag's birthday, who will get a chance to try it out?

programme.desc: The Squirrels and Duggee go looking for a special leaf, but find something surprising!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Duggee is sowing seeds. The squirrels want to grow something too but who will grow what?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Duggee shows the squirrels how to make a paper boat out of newspaper.

programme.desc: The Squirrels look for something interesting to share at the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 19
programme.desc: Duggee introduces the squirrels to Bucky his old rocking horse. Saddle up, squirrels!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: Oh dear, poor Norrie is sick. Can the squirrels think of something to cheer her up?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a little worm. It's swallowed a bit too much earth and has the hiccups.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels build a maze out of all the things in Duggee's workshop.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: It's a hot day and Duggee's flowers are looking sad. Some water would perk them up.

programme.desc: Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree, because she thinks it's broken.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: Duggee is blowing up balloons for Tino the grumpy artistic mouse's birthday.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels play hide and seek. Duggee counts while the Squirrels hide.

programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels decide to play Hide and Seek.

programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a snowman.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 54

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 27
programme.desc: Noddy is suspicious when Revs suddenly slows down during a race on the roller coaster in DareDale. He doesn't like to lose and doesn't understand what's happened. Noddy needs to investigate so that they don't lose another race! Using all his investigate skills Noddy follows the clues to the Farm where he finds out that Revs deliberately slowed down so his friend Tractor wouldn't come last as usual. Noddy realises what a great friend Revs is to Tractor.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 28
programme.desc: Everyone is enjoying playing games on Toy Green but when Noddy and Big Ears come back from apple picking at the farm they discover someone, or something, has broken a key on the xylophone bridge. Noddy needs to investigate! With the help of Bumpy and Revs and using the wwwbook to gather clues, Noddy discovers that someone has tried to fix it with purple sticky tape. If he can find out who uses purple sticky tape he might discover who broke the key.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 27
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Ostrich was all covered in feathers and unlike all the other birds, Ostrich wasn't very good at flying at all. One night in Tinga Tinga Spider decided to make Jackal a pair of wings so that he could fly up to the moon and stop howling! Jackal and Spider stole the feathers from Ostrich's neck and legs until she looked like a very big plucked chicken! The next day Ostrich was mortified and stuck her head in the ground so that Lion couldn't see her.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 28
programme.desc: You see there was time when Camel didn't have a hump. He lived very far away in the hot desert. But one day the desert got too hot… even for Camel. So he started walking. When Camel arrived at the Waterhole he asked the animals if he good have a drink. All the animals weren't pleased at all because the rains hadn't come and they were very thirsty.

programme.title: Who The Bloody Hell Are We? S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Filmmaker, author and perennial troublemaker John Safran embarks on a playful quest to discover the role that Jews have played in modern Australia's story.

programme.title: Alone Australia S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: After 67 Days, Alone Australia has its inaugural winner. The Reunion brings the 10 participants together again to relive key moments, share unseen footage and reflect on their incredible journeys.

programme.title: Aussie Mavericks S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: On Darwin's outskirts a small community of Cambodian farmers produce food for local market stalls. Many fled the murderous Khmer Rouge regime. Meet the mango grower whose personal history is extraordinary and humbling.

programme.title: National Press Club Address (2024) - EP 46
programme.desc: Jelena Dokic, Former World #4 Tennis Player, TEDx Presenter and Speaker, Commentator and two-time Bestselling Author, addresses the Press Club in partnership with Women in Media on the topic "Unbreakable". (Final for 2024)

programme.title: The World This Week (2024) - EP 48
programme.desc: Andrea Nierhoff brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents in the Indo Pacific, Europe, USA, the Middle East and Indonesia. (Final for 2024)

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef: A Living Treasu S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Stretching 2,300 kilometres down the northeast coast of Queensland, the reef is home to over 900 islands each with their own unique biology and fauna.

programme.title: The Beautiful Bush (2021) - EP 4
programme.desc: John Glover was a colonial artist called the father of Australian landscape painting. His historic Tasmanian home and property has been restored, while remaining a wool business. Landline's Margot Ellis reported in 2019

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast (2024) - EP 50
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Kathryn Robinson, plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S4 - EP 42
programme.desc: Our hosts head to the cinema for our last episode of That Pacific Sports Show for the year. They look back at everything that was, including a special Paris wrap up and of course, a blooper reel. Signing off for 2024!

programme.title: ABC News (2024) - EP 100
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Australian Story (2023) - EP 31
programme.desc: Singer Elly-May Barnes on stepping out of her famous father Jimmy's musical shadow, on the long road to the spotlight and how she channels her physical challenges into a powerful cabaret act.

programme.title: Alone Australia S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: After 67 Days, Alone Australia has its inaugural winner. The Reunion brings the 10 participants together again to relive key moments, share unseen footage and reflect on their incredible journeys.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces (2021) - EP 3
programme.desc: The gourmet chefs turned station cooks. In 2018 two retired chefs fulfilled their dream to cook for the hungry crew of an outback cattle station. But for staff used to plain food, there were a few changes needed to the menu.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine’s 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon 2024
programme.desc: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon made its debut from Studio 6B in Rockefeller Center on Feb. 17, 2014. Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. programme.title: Africa Live

RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. programme.title: Africa Live

Could we think of him as good?

programme.desc: A romantic black comedy takes place at "Darim family's laundry" where they dry-clean money instead of clothes.

programme.title: Iron Family - EP 20
programme.desc: A romantic black comedy takes place at "Darim family's laundry" where they dry-clean money instead of clothes.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: KBS World Daily English News _x000D_Anchor : Choi Kyu-yeon

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles - EP 463
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: ASEAN-KOREA MUSIC FESTIVAL ROUND in Laos
programme.desc: Musicians from 10 ASEAN countries and Korea will come together in one place to share their music with a global audience, creating an unforgettable music festival experience.

programme.title: Cheer Up! - EP 5
programme.desc: This drama features 18-year-old characters growth and their anecdotes happening at a prestige boarding high school with a high college entrance rate. One day, cheering club Baekho with honor students and dancing club Real King with problem students unified as a cheerleading club. What will happen when they are gathered for a cheerleading?

programme.title: My Merry Marriage - EP 45
programme.desc: A family drama that questions the true meaning of 'happiness' by showing various aspects of marriage such as divorce, remarriage, and late marriage.

programme.title: Cinderella Game - EP 6
programme.desc: A story of a woman who realizes the meaning of true revenge while she has been used as a fake daughter by her enemy.

programme.title: Zombie Detective - EP 5
programme.desc: There are zombies living in our town? A comic story of a resurrected zombie becoming a detective to find his own past.

programme.title: 2024 Changwon K-POP World Festival
programme.desc: 2024 KBS Changwon K-POP WORLD FESTIVAL is the world's largest Korean Wave festival with global K-POP fans from all over the world.

programme.title: The Seasons W
programme.desc: On Saturday night, when the end of one week meets the start of another, this show will bring you music and stories that will soothe your worries and concerns.

programme.title: Korea-Khitan War - EP 3
programme.desc: Korea-Khitan War is about numerous heroes, including King Hyeonjong and General Gang Gamchan, who led the 26-year-long war against the Khitans, the strongest power of the time, to victory.

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 4
programme.desc: While assisting the police in their investigation and trying to reverse the case involving her father, forensic doctor Song An Yan (Charlene Choi) joins hands with hot-blooded detective Liu Zhi Ming (Joseph Chang) in their desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 5
programme.desc: While assisting the police in their investigation and trying to reverse the case involving her father, forensic doctor Song An Yan (Charlene Choi) joins hands with hot-blooded detective Liu Zhi Ming (Joseph Chang) in their desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: A Female Student Arrives at the Imperial College - EP 5
programme.desc: Story of the only daughter of the Grand Marshal, Sang Qi, who becomes the only female student at the Imperial College.

programme.title: As Beautiful As You - EP 40
programme.desc: Ji Xing (Tan Song Yun), refuses to endure the stifling corporate grind, she quits her job to embark on a challenging entrepreneurial journey and eventually secures the investment of Han Ting (Xu Kai). Together, they advance in the medical and health industry.

programme.title: ICAC Investigators 2024 - EP 1
programme.desc: The brand-new series ICAC Investigators 2024 continues to educate the public about the dangers of corruption, while also showcasing the indomitable and fearless spirit of the anti-corruption staff.

programme.title: Good Partner - EP 5
programme.desc: The story follows popular divorce lawyer Cha Eun-Kyung (Jang Na-ra), who finds herself faced with her own marital crisis. She often clashes with rookie lawyer Han Yoo-Ri (Nam Ji-Hyun) over cases. A workplace battle between the two lawyers is about to unfold.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 1
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Homemade Love Story - EP 97
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Homemade Love Story - EP 98
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Hilarious Family - EP 10
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1842
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 514
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption - EP 18
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One - EP 24
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1842
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West - EP 38
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynasty's peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Chang'an for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West - EP 39
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynasty's peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Chang'an for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.

programme.title: Only For Love - EP 14
programme.desc: Hardworking financial reporter Zheng Shu Yi (Bai Lu) is determined to land a front-page story with Shi Yan (Dylan Wang) a successful young CEO that the whole city is talking about. She pulls all the stops, eventually gets through to him and even love blossoms.

programme.title: Only For Love - EP 15

programme.title: Choice Husband - EP 22
programme.desc: Shen Miao is the treasured daughter of the wealthiest merchant in Yangzhou City but is not the luckiest when it comes to marriage. Stay tuned to a twisted love tale she's involved between a talented scholar and rich glib.

programme.title: Golden Bowl - EP 3
programme.desc: Three Man brothers each opened their own noodle store to compete with each other. Mother Wan (Nancy Sit) has no choice but to help them settle the dispute by using their family treasure to get the brothers to compete with the eventual goal of uniting them.

programme.title: Golden Bowl - EP 4
programme.desc: Three Man brothers each opened their own noodle store to compete with each other. Mother Wan (Nancy Sit) has no choice but to help them settle the dispute by using their family treasure to get the brothers to compete with the eventual goal of uniting them.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 73
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 16
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 19
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 20
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 27
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 11
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 11
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 27
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 25
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 26
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai's most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sang's father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: My Wife is 18
programme.desc: Cheung, a dull thirty-year-old man, gets married in the UK to lovely YoYo, who is just eighteen, so as to fulfil their parents' wishes. Back in Hong Kong, their relationship is that of an assumed couple, as well as a teacher and student. With contradictions and funny incidents governing their relationship, the two gradually fall in love...

programme.title: Seven Swords
programme.desc: Seven warriors of exceptional swordsmanship band together to protect a village from an evil general in this exciting martial arts film.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Anna in Kungfu-Land
programme.desc: An advertising executive, Kin, launches a martial arts tournament as an advertising campaign for his client. He travels to Japan to invite Shaolin descendant, Anna, to join the tournament. This results in attracting the eccentric masters of other eight sects to join too. As the tournament approaches, Kin and Anna unconsciously fall for each other...

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: The Sparrow
programme.desc: Kei is an experienced "Sparrow", a pickpocket who likes to take photos of the people and events around him. One day, a mysterious yet beautiful woman, Jenny, appears in his viewfinder and Kei is instantly attracted to her. Jenny's beauty fascinates Kei, but behind this attractive facade lies a mysterious past and a secret mission...

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: In Laws, Out Laws
programme.desc: When priceless antiques were found in the backyard of Auntie Kang's home, the family finds themselves becoming sudden millionaires. Their arguments and disagreements lead to hilarious results as each of Auntie Kang's sons tries his darnedest to get the biggest shares!

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from "Nine Yang Scriptures" by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son's arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan's family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan's daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui's embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love...

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the "Full Moon Scimitar", on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper's daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: i Walker
programme.desc: Eight i Walkers take you around the world in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: i Walker
programme.desc: Eight i Walkers take you around the world in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: TVBS News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest Taiwan and international news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: i Walker
programme.desc: Eight i Walkers take you around the world in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!

programme.title: Perfect Match 12 - EP 6
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Axian Small Town Foodcation - EP 4
programme.desc: Unearthing flavours along the small town trail, Axian Small Town Foodcation is seeking out a trail for nostalgic foodies to follow. Along the way, food is not the only nourishment, the stories and memories that unfold along the way feed the soul as well.

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 20
programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 21
programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.

programme.title: James' Going Places 8 - EP 20
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Chinese Restaurant 8 - EP 11
programme.desc: This season, the show ventures to Fondation Monet in Giverny, France, with inventive Olympic and Chinese fashion-themed dishes. Unearth new food stories in France's beautiful villages.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 206
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Mr Player 15 - EP 20
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: The Spicy Flavor of Shaanxi - EP 3
programme.desc: Each specialty dish from Shaanxi exudes a deep, smoky aroma, revealing its rich culinary tradition. Step beyond the boundaries of space and time to embark on a tantalizing journey of aroma and spice, and savor the unique flavors exclusive to Shaanxi.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Kazama Kimichika: Kyojo Zero - EP 10
programme.desc: Kazama Kimichika (Takuya Kimura) works as a detective instructor. Through a system called 'Kazama Dojo,' a rookie detective is paired with Kazama, and they investigate an actual murder case together. The rookie detective learns techniques used by Kazama while they work on the murder case.

programme.title: Perfect Match 12 - EP 6
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Time Concert 2024 - EP 3
programme.desc: After 20 years, the Girls are back on stage! "Time Concert 2024" revives nostalgic melodies, celebrating two decades of music with a dazzling showcase and a competition for the top hits of the era!

programme.title: The Spicy Flavor of Shaanxi - EP 3

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: Playboy millionaire Tiger Hung seeks refuge in a mountain retreat run by the Omei Clan, an all-female group of martial artists. There, martial artist May enlists his help to unlock the powerful "Heartbroken Sword" technique, leading to a whirlwind of emotions and unexpected romance.

programme.title: James' Going Places 8 - EP 20
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Life is A Long Quiet River - EP 9
programme.desc: The story centers Feng Xiaoqin and Gu Qingyu, two sisters-in-law who work through their differences and grow closer in life. Faced with strong pursuit from Zhao Xiang and the reappearance of her childhood sweet heart Shi Yuan, Qingyu is entangled.

programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.
